item.description: Best Friends is hosting a fall meet up group. It's free to bring your friendly pups to socialize. We have an all indoor playroom where your pets can be off leash to romp and play. We provide water, toys, and clean up. Halloween costumes are encouraged! We will have a prize for "best dressed." There will also be cider and doughnuts for human guests. If you're looking for a fun afternoon to get out of the house and give your dog some healthy exercize, come play! Please keep in mind...Vaccines are required to interact with other dogs.

group.name: The Rocky Hill "All Breed" Meetup Group

item.name: Halloween Party!
